column4: Is it possible to install Windows (dualboot) after Ubuntu? Because I heard Windows -has- to be on the first partition..?
not on the same hd.  windows will overwrite grub.
bah, I want to make a dualboot system (barebone stripped windows for games) but I already have ubuntu, guess ill just have to backup and reinstall Windows and then Ubuntu?
I'm pretty sure you could install windows, then boot off a ubuntu bootdisc and reinstall / reconfigure grub, but off the top of my head I don't know specifics on how to do that.
